subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Guan Tianlang of China, the reigning champion of a competition conceived by Augusta National in 2008 to develop amateur golfers, will bring his budding game there for the Masters this week.
snippet: Guan Tianlang of China, the reigning champion of a competition conceived by Augusta National in 2008 to develop amateur golfers, will bring his budding game there for the Masters this week.
